amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to reauthorize the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act and improve fisheries management and data collection.
amendment.purpose: A substitute amendment No. 8 printed in House Report 114-128 to reauthorize the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act and improves fisheries management and data collection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Huffman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
